DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Pelvis Drainage Removed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date on which information regarding a device used for the withdrawal of fluids and discharges from a wound, sore or cavity placed within the pelvis being removed after a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information regarding a device used for the withdrawal of fluids and discharges from a wound, sore or cavity placed within the pelvis being removed after a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: The structure of the vertebrate skeleton supporting the lower limbs in humans and the hind limbs or corresponding parts in other vertebrates.:The systematic withdrawal of fluids and discharges from a wound, sore or cavity.:Removed; taken out of or separated from.

Concepts.definition: The bony, basin-shaped structure formed by the hipbones and the base of the backbone supporting the lower limbs in humans.
The systematic withdrawal of fluids and discharges from a wound, sore or cavity.
Taken out of, separated from, or eliminated.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013
